from pyspark.sql import functions as F

hzn_users_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-EXTRACT/Users.csv"

hzn = (spark.read.option("header","true").csv(hzn_users_path)
    .withColumn("coEmailAddress", F.trim(F.col("coEmailAddress")))
    .withColumn("user_email_raw", F.lower(F.col("coEmailAddress")))
    .withColumn("user_email_local", F.split(F.col("user_email_raw"), "@").getItem(0))
)

print("Horizon users rows:", hzn.count())
display(hzn.limit(20))

entra_path = "abfss://horizon-migration-poc@pinsstodwdevuks9h80mb.dfs.core.windows.net/MPESC-TRANSFORM/Entra.json"

entra_raw = spark.read.json(entra_path)

# Flatten if it's Graph paging shape with "value"
if "value" in entra_raw.columns:
    entra = entra_raw.select(F.explode("value").alias("u")).select("u.*")
else:
    entra = entra_raw

# Ensure mail exists even if not in schema
if "mail" not in entra.columns:
    entra = entra.withColumn("mail", F.lit(None).cast("string"))

entra = (entra
    .withColumn("entra_email_raw", F.lower(F.trim(F.coalesce(F.col("mail"), F.col("userPrincipalName")))))
    .withColumn("entra_email_local", F.split(F.col("entra_email_raw"), "@").getItem(0))
    .select(
        F.col("id").alias("idpUserId"),
        "mail",
        "userPrincipalName",
        "displayName",
        "entra_email_local"
    )
    .dropDuplicates(["entra_email_local"])
)

print("Entra user rows:", entra.count())
display(entra.limit(20))
